trans-unit.source: Results returned after a call to <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.SaveChanges*> when enumerating operation responses returned by the <xref href="System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Os resultados devolvidos após uma chamada para <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.SaveChanges*>ao enumerar as respostas de operação devolvidas pelo <xref href="System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse"> </xref> classe</xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.SaveChanges*>

trans-unit.source: ChangeOperationResponse objects are not intended to be constructed directly by a user of this library.
trans-unit.target: ChangeOperationResponse objetos não se destinam a ser construído diretamente por um utilizador desta biblioteca.

trans-unit.source: Instead, references are returned when enumerating the operation responses returned via the enumerator on the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse> class.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, as referências são devolvidas quando enumerar as respostas de operação devolvida através do enumerador da <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse>classe.</xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.SaveChanges%2A> submits pending changes to the data service collected by the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext> since the last call to <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.SaveChanges%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.SaveChanges%2A>submete alterações para o serviço de dados recolhido pelo <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext>desde a última chamada para <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.SaveChanges%2A>.</xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.SaveChanges%2A> </xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext> pendentes</xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.SaveChanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: Changes are added to the context by calling <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.AddObject%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.AddLink%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.DeleteObject%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.DeleteLink%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.Detach%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.DetachLink%2A>, and similar methods.
trans-unit.target: As alterações são adicionadas ao contexto chamando <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.AddObject%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.AddLink%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.DeleteObject%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.DeleteLink%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.Detach%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.DetachLink%2A>e métodos semelhantes.</xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.DetachLink%2A> </xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.Detach%2A> </xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.DeleteLink%2A> </xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.DeleteObject%2A> </xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.AddLink%2A> </xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.AddObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.SaveChanges%2A> returns a <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse> that represents the response to all operations sent to the data service.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.SaveChanges%2A>Devolve um <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse>que representa a resposta para todas as operações enviados para o serviço de dados.</xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse></xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.SaveChanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse> object includes a sequence of ChangeOperationResponse objects that, in turn, contain a sequence of <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.EntityDescriptor> or <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.LinkDescriptor> instances that represent the changes that were persisted or attempted.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse>objeto inclui uma sequência de objetos de ChangeOperationResponse que, por sua vez, conter uma sequência de <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.EntityDescriptor>ou <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.LinkDescriptor>instâncias que representam as alterações que foram continuadas ou tentaram.</xref:System.Data.Services.Client.LinkDescriptor> </xref:System.Data.Services.Client.EntityDescriptor> </xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceResponse>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Data.Services.Client.EntityDescriptor"></xref> or <xref href="System.Data.Services.Client.LinkDescriptor"></xref> modified by a change operation.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Data.Services.Client.EntityDescriptor"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.Data.Services.Client.LinkDescriptor"> </xref> modificado por uma operação de alteração.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.Services.Client.EntityDescriptor"></xref> or <xref href="System.Data.Services.Client.LinkDescriptor"></xref> modified by a change operation.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Data.Services.Client.EntityDescriptor"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.Data.Services.Client.LinkDescriptor"> </xref> modificado por uma operação de alteração.
